mapper.insert: /* 방, 닉네임이 중복되지 않을 경우만 insert */ INSERT INTO coin_station.tb_coin_nick (coin_symbol, nick_nm, ref_room_id, create_dt) SELECT #{coin_symbol}, #{nick_nm}, #{ref_room_id}, now() FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM coin_station.tb_coin_nick WHERE #{nick_nm} = nick_nm AND #{ref_room_id} = ref_room_id );
